item.title: Comstock Inc S-1
item.description: Comstock Inc, which is in the Industrial Organic Chemicals [2860] industry, SEC S-1 filing on July 08, 2022 had 34689 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 31 - 483 instances company - 481 instances shares - 460 instances 2021 - 457 instances stock - 407 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
